title: An all-star guide to throwing the perfect party
text:
Radio 2's All-Star Party will be "an evening not to be missed," Craig says. And would it even be a party without Craig Charles?

What's the perfect party food?

My wife is a perfect host, and she gets all those canapés and all that finger food and stuff. I like the little samosas and onion bhajis. I like it spicy. A good way to get a party started.

What songs need to be on the party playlist?

Anything by Stevie Wonder. You can't go wrong with Stevie, especially from his classic 70's phase. So, things like Sir Duke, I Wish, Superstition, stuff like that is proper go-to, party-starting music. If you can't dance to Stevie then you should throw away your feet.
description: You need lots of Stevie Wonder, a pair of comfortable shoes and some spicy food
